sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="list-home">
    <v-data-table
      :headers="homes.headers"
      :items="homes.data"
      :items-per-page="5"
      class="elevation-1"
    >
      <template v-slot:item.actions="props">
        <v-btn small v-on:click="activeHome(props.item._source.homeId)">Active</v-btn>
      </template>
    </v-data-table>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "ListHomeAdmin",
  data() {
    return {
      homes: {
        headers: [
          { text: "Name", value: "_source.name" },
          { text: "Type", value: "_source.typeName" },
          { text: "Guest", value: "_source.maxGuest" },
          { text: "Price", value: "_source.price" },
          { text: "Status", value: "_source.isActive" },
          { text: "", value: "actions", sortable: false }
        ],
        data: []
      }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    activeHome(_homeId) {
      let vm = this;
      const options = {
        method: "PUT",
        headers: { Authorization: localStorage.getItem("jwtToken") },
        url: "http://localhost:8080/booking/api/v1/home/active/" + _homeId
      };
      vm.$axios(options)
        .then(() => {
          alert("done!");
        })
        .catch(e => {
          console.log(e);
        });
    }
  },
  mounted: function() {
    let vm = this;
    var query = {
      indice: "Home",
      query: {
        bool: {
          must: [
            {
              match: {
                _type: "Home"
              }
            },
            {
              match: {
                isActive: 2
              }
            }
          ]
        }
      }
    };

    this.$axios
      .post(`http://localhost:8080/booking/api/v1/_search`, query, {
        headers: {
          Authorization: "Basic " + localStorage.getItem("token")
        }
      })
      .then(response => {
        vm.homes.data = response.data.hits.hits;
      })
      .catch(e => {
        console.log(e);
      });
  }
};
</script>

<style>
</style>
